mapper.select: select CODE , case WHEN #{langCode}= 'zh' THEN CODE_ZH WHEN #{langCode} = 'en' THEN CODE_EN WHEN #{langCode} = 'ja' THEN CODE_JA ELSE CODE_NM end as CODE_NM ,PARENT_CODE ,DEPTH ,ORDER_CNT ,USE_YN from wj_country_code where 1=1 and PARENT_CODE =#{parentCode} and USE_YN ='Y' order by ORDER_CNT asc
